1_14tAcPqWayGvvfyGRnW7R94hCRE75z8QsE.body:
Porphyria was a widespread  hereditary disease  among Jews
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Porphyria
Deficiency in the enzymes of the porphyrin pathway leads to insufficient production of heme. Heme function plays a central role in cellular metabolism. 
This affects the blood synthesis. This is the reason why they need blood.
The sickness causes photosensitivity also. This is one of the reasons why Ashkenazi Jews never worked as peasants but as traders.
